Text:
@ melanieandlarryzz; How on earth do you know it's a fake? The torrent has only been up for 52 minutes and no one has finished downloading it.  Currently 1 Seeder 7 Leechers (average 46.4%).  

Before stating that something is fake you should actually find out if it is first.
It's a legit download.  A good copy of The Best of Elmo 2.  Don't be fooled by melanieandlarryzz's comment.

considering everything i have downloaded from you i dont have any worries downloading this. some people just want to make it look like its a bad download so no one downloads your stuff. Nothing wrong with this torrent at all!
